intension: Design a Facebook cover promoting a healthy and delicious breakfast with a sale and discount of up to 60% off.
globalcaption: The image features a white plate with a delicious breakfast meal. The plate is topped with a slice of toast, a fried egg, and a tomato. The toast is placed on the left side of the plate, while the egg and tomato are positioned towards the right. The meal is presented in a visually appealing manner, making it an enticing breakfast option.
keywords: breakfast, food, meal, nutrition, morning, delicious, healthy, tasty, plate, dish, fresh, gourmet, plate, toast, tomatoes, eggs, sale, discount, facebook, cover, fb, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a large, round, yellow circle in the center. The circle is the main focus of the image, and it stands out against the white background

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a white plate with a delicious breakfast meal. On the plate, there is a slice of toast, a fried egg, and a few tomatoes. The toast is placed on the left side of the plate, while the egg and tomatoes are positioned towards the right side. The combination of these ingredients creates a tasty and satisfying meal
